eu.smartdatalake.simsearch

Class DatasetIdentifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.DatasetIdentifier

  • public class DatasetIdentifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides identification for the attribute of a given dataset.

      • generateUUID

        private java.util.UUID generateUUID()
        Generates a (non-random) Universally Unique Dataset Identifier (UUID).
        Returns:
        A 128-bit value that represents the UUID.

      • setValueAttribute

      • setOperation

        public void setOperation(int operation)
        Assign the type of the search operation to the identifier.
        Parameters:
        operation - An integer representing the type of the search operation (0: CATEGORICAL_TOPK; 1:SPATIAL_KNN ; 2:NUMERICAL_TOPK).

      • setDataSource

        public void setDataSource(DataSource source)
        Assign a data source to the identifier.
        Parameters:
        source - The data source providing the attribute values, either in-memory (CSV) or in-situ (JDBC).
